statements: UPDATE Loan_Default_Risk SET credit_score = 700 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE Loan_Default_Risk SET employment_status = 'Employed' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE Loan_Default_Risk SET default_risk = TRUE WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE Loan_Default_Risk SET loan_amount = loan_amount * 1.05 WHERE income > 50000 AND employment_status = 'Employed';
UPDATE Loan_Default_Risk SET loan_term = CASE WHEN credit_score < 600 THEN 12 WHEN credit_score >= 600 AND credit_score < 700 THEN 24 ELSE 36 END;
UPDATE Loan_Default_Risk SET default_risk = TRUE WHERE credit_score < 550 OR (income < 30000 AND loan_amount > 5000);
UPDATE loan_data SET loan_status = 'Approved' WHERE customer_id = 12345;
UPDATE financial_data SET income = 60000.00 WHERE customer_id = 12345;
UPDATE loan_data SET loan_amount = 15000.00 WHERE customer_id = 54321;
UPDATE loan_data SET loan_amount = loan_amount * 1.1 WHERE customer_id = 123
UPDATE financial_data SET expenses = expenses + 500 WHERE customer_id = 456
UPDATE loan_data ld JOIN financial_data fd ON ld.customer_id = fd.customer_id SET ld.loan_amount = ld.loan_amount + (fd.income - fd.expenses) WHERE ld.customer_id = 789
UPDATE customers SET credit_score = 750 WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE loans SET loan_status = 'Approved' WHERE loan_id = 101;
UPDATE transactions SET transaction_amount = 500.00 WHERE transaction_id = 201;

UPDATE loans SET loan_status = 'approved' WHERE loan_id = 101;
UPDATE transactions SET transaction_amount = 500.00 WHERE transaction_id = 201;
UPDATE Customers SET credit_score = 700 WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE Loans SET interest_rate = 4.5 WHERE loan_id = 101;
UPDATE PaymentHistory SET payment_amount = 500.00 WHERE payment_id = 201;
UPDATE Customers SET credit_score = 750 WHERE customer_id = 101;
UPDATE Loans SET interest_rate = 5.5, loan_term = 36 WHERE loan_id = 201;
UPDATE PaymentHistory SET payment_amount = 1500 WHERE payment_id = 301;
UPDATE Applicants SET credit_score = 750 WHERE applicant_id = 1;
UPDATE Loans SET loan_amount = 15000.00 WHERE loan_id = 101;
UPDATE CreditHistory SET credit_utilization = 30.50 WHERE applicant_id = 1;
UPDATE Applicants SET credit_score = 750, income = 60000 WHERE applicant_id = 12345;
UPDATE Loans SET loan_amount = 25000, interest_rate = 4.5 WHERE loan_id = 54321;
UPDATE CreditHistory SET payment_history = 'No late payments in the last 12 months' WHERE applicant_id = 12345;
